Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: This week a group of people took to social media to discuss the Australian government's upcoming budget. The officials promised to introduce a targeted cost of living package to help Aussies make ends meet. The posts also highlighted a significant investment of $11.3 billion in aged care wages and plans to introduce a PSMB in the future. The tweets also joked about Jim Chalmers' ability to take charge of the national budget. Overall people seem to have mixed feelings about the upcoming budget and are looking forward to seeing what the government will deliver.
